author: Tony Tobin
method: Place all of the ingredients, except the ciabatta, into a food processor and blend until smooth. Serve spread thickly onto the toasted ciabatta.
ingredients: 2 garlic cloves,  1 large handful fresh basil,  1 large handful flatleaf parsley,  1 tbsp breadcrumbs,  2 tbsp olive oil,  salt,  1 handful cashew nuts,  toasted ciabatta, to serve
